summaryInsights.title: Membership signal
summaryInsights.detail: Membership roughly flat; spend growth driven by higher acuity and downtown commercial mix.

summaryInsights.title: Medical cost drivers
summaryInsights.detail: Cardiology DRGs 246/247 and neuro CPTs for advanced imaging are driving unit cost and utilization lift; oncology infusion J-codes rising.

summaryInsights.title: Provider concentration
summaryInsights.detail: NYP, Mount Sinai, and Northwell running above escalators; out-of-network imaging centers pulling high-cost MRI/CT volume.

summaryInsights.title: Policy gap to address
summaryInsights.detail: Oncology drug step therapy and site-of-care policies need tightening; consider radiation/chemo prior-auth refresh for high-variance providers.
